mav_sim.chap7.run_sim module¶

Run the chapter 6 simulation mavsim_python

  • Chapter 6 assignment for Beard & McLain, PUP, 2012

  • Last Update:

    2/2/2019 - RWB 1/22 - GND

mav_sim.chap7.run_sim.run_sim(sim: ~mav_sim.message_types.msg_sim_params.MsgSimParams, init_state: ~mav_sim.chap3.mav_dynamics.DynamicState | None = None, mav_view: ~mav_sim.chap2.mav_viewer.MavViewer | None = None, data_view: ~mav_sim.chap3.data_viewer.DataViewer | None = None, sensor_view: ~mav_sim.chap7.sensor_viewer.SensorViewer | None = None, use_wind: bool = False, gust_params: ~mav_sim.message_types.msg_gust_params.MsgGustParams | None = None, Va_command: ~mav_sim.tools.signals.Signals = <mav_sim.tools.signals.Signals object>, altitude_command: ~mav_sim.tools.signals.Signals = <mav_sim.tools.signals.Signals object>, course_command: ~mav_sim.tools.signals.Signals = <mav_sim.tools.signals.Signals object>) → tuple[MavViewer, DataViewer, SensorViewer]¶

Runs the chapter 6 simulation

Parameters:

  • sim – Timing and file parameters for the simulation

  • init_state – Initial state of the MAV

  • mav_view – Viewing window to be used for the mav

  • data_view – Viewing window to be used for the states

  • use_wind – True => wind will be used, False => no wind

Returns:

Viewing window to be used for the mav data_view: Viewing window to be used for the states

Return type:

mav_view

mav_sim
